Title: The Best Intentions
Description:
Not only did they beat him--they put him in shackles too!

What's worse is... I probably would have done the same...

We will not be able to carry Marithos out of here with this weight chained to him. The key must be around the camp somewhere. Try to find it, $n, while I keep him comfortable.
ObjectivesText: Look for a key to Marithos's shackles in the Lonely Falls.
